channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 Reasons Behind The Rise Of ‘Reverse Age-Gap’ Relationships, By A Psychologist
item.description: The rise of the reverse age-gap is an indicator of how far we’ve come in reimagining relationships as spaces of growth rather than social contracts.

item.title: SM Energy is acquiring Civitas in $13 billion oil and gas merger of near equals in the Permian Basin
item.description: The merger is the biggest oil and gas deal in months as the U.S. industry continues to consolidate.

item.description: As the shutdown drags on, the White House is leaning into online trolling with fake MySpace pages and memes.

item.title: Agentic AI’s Token Paradox: When Cheaper Means More Expensive
item.description: AI is getting cheaper per token but more expensive in total as companies deploy autonomous agents that transform efficiency and enterprise value.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
